member.summary: Generates a Stride project for compiling the specified assets.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for Stride asset compilation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.StrideVersion
member.summary: Stride version to use for compilation (e.g., "4.2.0.2188"). If not specified, uses the latest available.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.DotnetPath
member.summary: Path to dotnet executable. Defaults to "dotnet" (using PATH).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.Configuration
member.summary: Build configuration (Debug or Release).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.Platform
member.summary: Target platform for asset compilation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.GraphicsBackend
member.summary: Graphics backend for compilation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.BuildTimeoutMs
member.summary: Timeout for build operations in milliseconds.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.VerboseOutput
member.summary: Whether to capture detailed build output for logging.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.MaxTextureSize
member.summary: Maximum texture dimension for compilation. Larger textures will be downscaled.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.GenerateMipmaps
member.summary: Whether to generate mipmaps for textures.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.TextureCompression
member.summary: Texture compression format.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideCompilerOptions.AutoDetectWsl
member.summary: Whether to automatically detect and handle WSL environment. When true (default), paths will be converted for Windows tools when running in WSL.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StridePlatform
member.summary: Target platforms for Stride compilation.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StridePlatform.Windows
member.summary: Windows desktop (x64).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StridePlatform.Linux
member.summary: Linux desktop (x64).

member.summary: Android mobile.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StridePlatform.iOS
member.summary: iOS mobile.

member.summary: DirectX 11.

member.summary: DirectX 12.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideGraphicsBackend.Vulkan
member.summary: Vulkan.

member.summary: OpenGL (Linux/macOS).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression
member.summary: Texture compression formats for Stride.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.None
member.summary: No compression (RGBA8).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.BC1
member.summary: BC1 (DXT1) - RGB, no alpha, 4:1 compression.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.BC3
member.summary: BC3 (DXT5) - RGBA with interpolated alpha, 4:1 compression.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.BC7
member.summary: BC7 - High quality RGBA, 3:1 compression.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.ETC2
member.summary: ETC2 - Mobile-friendly compression.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideTextureCompression.ASTC
member.summary: ASTC - Adaptive scalable texture compression.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser
member.summary: Parses Stride's asset index files to map asset URLs to content hashes.
member.remarks:
Index file format is simple text: {AssetURL} {32-char-hex-hash} {AssetURL} {32-char-hex-hash} ...
Example: Materials/Vegetation/TestMinimal a65a9e3f9c73c9f8e68aaf9283639541 Textures/rock_dif b05ee7fbcacbff609a69277b35856b5b

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.#ctor(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser})
member.summary: Creates a new index parser.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.ParseIndex
member.summary: Parses the Stride index and returns compiled asset entries.
member.returns: Dictionary of asset URL to index entry.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.FindBuildOutput
member.summary: Finds the build output directory.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.FindIndexFile(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Finds the index file in a database directory.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.ParseIndexFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Parses an index file and returns a mapping of asset URLs to content hashes.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexParser.GetBlobPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the path to a compiled asset blob given its content hash.

member.summary: Reads compiled asset data from database file.

member.summary: Gets the raw index dictionary for dependency collection.

member.summary: Gets the database directory.

member.summary: Path to the database file containing this asset.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexEntry.Offset
member.summary: Offset within the database file.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexEntry.Size
member.summary: Size of the asset data in bytes.

member.summary: Asset GUID assigned by Stride.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Compilation.StrideIndexEntry.Extension
member.summary: Asset type extension.

member.summary: Represents an asset compiled through Stride's pipeline.

member.summary: Stride GUID assigned during compilation.

member.summary: Stride ObjectId from the compiled output.

member.summary: Original source filename before compilation.

member.summary: Asset type as determined by Stride.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter
member.summary: Converts paths between WSL (Linux) and Windows formats. Required when running in WSL but invoking Windows tools (like Stride compiler).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter.IsWsl
member.summary: Gets whether the current environment is WSL.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter.ToWindowsPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Unix/WSL path to a Windows path.
member.returns: The Windows-formatted path, or the original path if conversion is not needed/possible.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter.ToUnixPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a Windows path to a Unix/WSL path.
member.returns: The Unix-formatted path, or the original path if conversion is not needed/possible.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter.CreateWindowsCommand(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a command string for running a Windows command from WSL. Uses cmd.exe /c with pushd/popd for directory context.
member.returns: A tuple of (executable, arguments) for Process.Start.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Stride.Platform.WslPathConverter.CreateWindowsProcessStartInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates ProcessStartInfo configured for running Windows commands from WSL.
